snippet.title: Daggerfall Trailer
snippet.description:
Original trailer for Bethesda's the Elder Scrolls: Daggerfall

DOS game released by Bethesda in 1996.
Minimum requirements were VGA graphics support, a 486 processor, 8 MB of RAM and a 2X CD-ROM drive.

This was the second game in the Daggerfall series.  Two of the more recent sequels to this game include Morrowind and Oblivion.

Game can now be downloaded for free from Bethesda: http://www.elderscrolls.com/downloads/downloads_games.htm

Trailer was included on the original retail CD for Elder Scrolls: Daggerall.

The music in the trailer is from Antonin Dvorak's Suite in A Major, "American Suite", Op. 98b. It's the final Allegro movement.
